short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Better, simpler website blocker to help you use the web with purpose

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A simple website blocker to help you use the web with purpose.

Purpose makes it easy to stay off distracting websites. However, when you really need to access something, say - an events page on Facebook or a tutorial on Youtube - Purpose is forgiving enough for you to get through. You need to provide Purpose a good reason first, allowing you to be more intentional about your web use.

This is an open-source project. Code can be found at https://github.com/hdavidzhu/purpose
